products.name: Instant Liquid Soap Refill – Unscented
products.description:
**Just add water. Solid Natural Cleaner Concentrate.**

**Click [here](/demos) for detailed dilute instructions.**

Great for hand washing dishes, how to clean a stovetop, and [more](/demos).

One bag makes 1 quart (32 oz.) full strength and can be diluted to 2 gallons.

This is the most environmentally friendly, natural Castile liquid soap on the market.

Join the future of plastic free, liquid soap and do your part in water conservation with the best, zero waste liquid soap refill. This bag and label are made out of kraft paper and is lined with a plant cellulose plastic. It is compostable.

**Three easy steps:**
1. Tear open the bag at the notch
2. Fill with water to the top of the label
3. Stir gently and pour into your dispenser

Use. It's that simple!

*The number 37 symbolizes a struggle to maintain a position*

*Saying: **Transmute a struggle into a challenge for yourself***

**Ingredients:** Saponified organic cocos nucifera (coconut) oil

This is a traditional Castile soap. No thickeners added or necessary.

This creation is patented and available for license. Click [here](https://www.soapisbest.com/license-instant-liquid-soap.html) for more information.
